recipe.title: Potato, Spinach and Pepper Frittata
recipe.subtitle: Served 8
recipe.ingredients: 6-8 large cooked potatoes, diced 1 cup cooked drained spinach 150g feta, crumbled 1 red pepper or 2 tomatoes, thinly sliced 12 large eggs 1 tsp salt, pepper 1/2 cup chopped fresh herbs, eg parsley, basil 100g gruyere, grated
recipe.steps: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease a 32cm x 23cm baking dish with butter or line with baking paper to cover base and sides. Spread potatoes on the base, cover with spinach, sprinkle with feta and top with pepper or tomatoes. Beat eggs lightly with salt and pepper. Mix in herbs and pour over vegetables. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake until set and lightly golden — 50—60 minutes. Serve warm or cool. Accompany with crisp green salad
